item.title: 欧洲就俄罗斯天然气被秘密混入供应发出警告
item.description: 一位被推举为欧盟能源政策负责人的候选人表示，欧盟明年的天然气供应中可能会偷偷混入来自俄罗斯的天然气，从而在目前的过境协议到期后给莫斯科提供一个不可取的变通办法。【原文：The European Union’s gas supplies next year may contain flows from Russia that are furtively mixed in, giving Moscow an undesirable workaround when a current transit deal expires, said a candidate tipped to run the bloc’s energy policy.】

item.title: 贝莱德降低 1,310 亿美元模型投资组合的风险
item.description: 随着市场在美联储降息周期和美国总统大选前进入动荡的 "新阶段"，这家全球最大的资产管理公司正在撤出一些筹码。【原文：The world’s biggest asset manager is taking some chips off the table as markets enter a “new phase” of turbulence ahead of a Federal Reserve interest rate cutting cycle and the US presidential election.】

item.title: 美国就业数据引发降息讨论，黄金随之波动
item.description: 一份重要的就业报告显示，尽管失业率有所下降，但美国上个月的招聘情况依然不温不火，这引发了关于美联储将在 9 月份会议上大幅降息的争论，黄金因此出现波动。【原文：Gold fluctuated after a key jobs report showed US hiring remained tepid last month even as the unemployment rate ticked lower, stoking a debate over how deep the Federal Reserve is going to cut interest rates at its September meeting.】

item.title: 俄罗斯本月初增加对匈牙利和斯洛伐克的石油输量
item.description: 9 月初，俄罗斯通过乌克兰向匈牙利和斯洛伐克出口的原油大幅增加，塔特石油公司（Tatneft PJSC）和其他生产商取代了被制裁的卢克石油公司（Lukoil PJSC）。【原文：Russia’s crude oil exports to Hungary and Slovakia via Ukraine rose significantly in early September, with Tatneft PJSC and other producers replacing sanctioned Lukoil PJSC’s barrels.】

item.title: 加拿大银行股在利率周期转折点出现分化
item.description:
另外，为什么加拿大人现在比美国人储蓄更多。【原文：

Also, why Canadians are now saving more than Americans.

】

item.title: 美联储威廉姆斯称现在适合降低利率
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行行长约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）表示，鉴于在降低通胀率方面取得的进展以及劳动力市场的降温，央行现在应该降低利率。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of New York President John Williams said it is now appropriate for the central bank to reduce interest rates, given progress on lowering inflation and a cooling in the labor market.】

item.title: 数据推动债券反弹，交易员加码押注美联储巨额减息
item.description: 在一份喜忧参半的美国劳动力市场报告公布后，美国国债上涨，交易商加大了对美联储本月将选择超大规模降息的押注。【原文：US Treasuries gained and traders ramped up their bets that the Federal Reserve will opt for a supersized interest-rate cut this month after a mixed report on the US labor market.】

item.title: 匈牙利应对增长和预算困境，福林承压
item.description: 匈牙利福林再次面临抛售压力，因为根据一系列广泛的措施，该国的经济表现恶化，使清理预算这一日益紧迫的任务变得更加复杂。【原文：The Hungarian forint came under renewed selling pressure as the country’s economic performance deteriorated according to a broad array of measures, complicating the increasingly urgent task of cleaning up its budget.】

item.title: 波兰货币政策委员会主席科特奇称，波兰通胀率明年将达到接近 6% 的峰值
item.description: 政策制定者路德维克-科特奇（Ludwik Kotecki）说，波兰的通胀率可能会在明年第一季度达到 6% 左右的峰值，然后逐渐下降，从而为降息打开空间。【原文：Polish inflation will likely peak at around 6% in the first quarter of next year and decline gradually from there, opening up room for interest-rate cuts, policymaker Ludwik Kotecki said.】

item.title: 德克萨斯资本公司同意 4 亿美元医疗保健交易并裁员
item.description: Texas Capital Bancshares 公司同意购买一个价值 4 亿美元的医疗保健公司投资组合，因为该公司正在推进一项战略计划，以扩大服务范围并提高效率— 这也导致了第三季度的一些裁员。【原文：Texas Capital Bancshares Inc. agreed to buy a $400 million portfolio of exposure to health-care companies as it presses ahead with a strategic plan to expand offerings and boost efficiencies — which also resulted in some layoffs in the third quarter.】

item.title: 欧佩克+"的快速解决方案掩盖了一个更大的问题：明年石油供应过多
item.description: 欧佩克+决定再限制生产一段时间，从而避免了今年的石油过剩。但这一临时措施并不能阻止 2025 年全球市场的供应过剩。【原文：OPEC+ has staved off an oil surplus this year by deciding to restrain production a little longer. But the temporary fix won’t hold back the supply glut awaiting global markets in 2025.】

item.title: 印度电网需要电池来实现可再生能源承诺
item.description:
为了实现气候目标，美国需要修复清洁能源的缺失环节，并大幅增加存储量。【原文：

To achieve climate goals, the nation needs to fix a missing clean-energy link — with a dramatic expansion in storage.

】

item.title: 富国银行聘请 Cully Davis 担任增长 ECM 主管
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.【原文：Wells Fargo & Co. has hired equity capital markets banker Cully Davis as head of its growth ECM franchise, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德将跳过布达佩斯欧盟峰会，仅出席欧元集团会议
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）将出席下周在布达佩斯举行的欧元区财长会议，不过她将跳过在匈牙利首都举行的更广泛的欧盟官员会议。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde will attend a meeting of euro-area finance chiefs in Budapest next week, though she’s skipping the broader gathering of European Union officials taking place in the Hungarian capital.】

item.title: 越南大亨面临二审，同时对死刑提出上诉
item.description: 越南房地产大亨张美兰（Truong My Lan）因涉嫌洗钱等罪名将于 9 月 19 日开始二审，她将对今年早些时候的死刑判决提出上诉。【原文：The second trial of Vietnamese real estate tycoon Truong My Lan on charges including alleged money laundering will begin Sept. 19 as she appeals a death penalty verdict from earlier this year.】

item.title: 中国港湾计划在尼日利亚商业中心修建铁路
item.description: 中国港湾工程有限责任公司同意在拉各斯修建一条 68 公里（42 英里）长的铁路，拉各斯是尼日利亚的商业中心，因交通堵塞而闻名，通勤者一堵就是几个小时。【原文：China Harbour Engineering Co. agreed to build a 68-kilometer (42-mile) railway in Lagos, the Nigerian commercial hub known for traffic snarl-ups that leave commuters stranded for hours.】

item.title: 尼日利亚奈拉创下新低，中央银行回调支持力度
item.description: 尼日利亚奈拉兑美元汇率跌至新低，分析师将此归咎于流动性稀缺，因为央行缩减了干预措施，外国投资者在国内债券上获利了结。【原文：Nigeria’s naira slipped to a fresh low against the dollar, with analysts blaming thin liquidity as the central bank scaled back intervention and foreign investors took profits on domestic bonds.】

item.title: 勒庞成为继马克龙总理人选之后的法国新掮客
item.description: 玛丽娜-勒庞和法国极右翼从未如此接近巴黎的权力杠杆，埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统即将上任的政府不得不依靠这个民族主义团体的暗中支持。【原文：Marine Le Pen and France’s far right have never been closer to the levers of power in Paris with President Emmanuel Macron’s incoming government forced to rely on the implicit backing of the nationalist group.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。大家都在关注今天晚些时候公布的美国就业报告，以及这份报告对美联储本月降息预期的影响。与此同时，欧元区也在为自己的利率调整做准备，对博通公司前景的反应表明，重要的不仅仅是人工智能。以下是您需要了解的信息— Morwenna Coniam.【原文：Good morning. All eyes are on the US payrolls report due later today and what it means for the Federal Reserve’s expected interest-rate cut this month. Meanwhile, the eurozone is gearing up for its own rate move and the reaction to Broadcom’s outlook shows it’s not just AI which matters. Here’s what you need to know — Morwenna Coniam.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利交易员预计非农就业将引发市场大幅波动
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的销售交易柜台表示，美联储利率决议的定位升高和高度不确定性很可能会引发市场对薪资数据的过度波动。【原文：Elevated positioning and high uncertainty about the Federal Reserve’s rate decision is likely to trigger outsized moves for markets over payroll numbers, according to Morgan Stanley’s sales trading desk.】

item.title: 美银美林哈特内特称若薪资疲软美国半导体股将大跌
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的策略师表示，如果周五的美国就业数据显示这个全球最大经济体将硬着陆，那么包括英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Semiconductor shares including Nvidia Corp. are in for a rough ride if US jobs data Friday point to a hard landing for the word’s biggest economy, according to strategists at Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 阿塞拜疆正在商谈向另外三个欧洲国家输送天然气
item.description: 阿塞拜疆正在就扩大向至少另外三个欧洲国家出口天然气进行谈判。【原文：Azerbaijan is in talks to expand exports of natural gas to at least three more countries in Europe.】

item.title: 中国就加拿大对电动汽车和金属征收关税向世贸组织提出申诉
item.description: 中国将把加拿大告上世界贸易组织，挑战渥太华对中国制造的电动汽车、钢铁和铝征收高达 100%新关税的决定。【原文：China will take Canada to the World Trade Organization to challenge Ottawa’s decision to impose new tariffs of up to 100% on Chinese-made electric vehicles, steel and aluminum.】

item.title: 花旗交易员押注美联储今年降息三次半点
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）的交易员押注美联储今年将降息三个半点，这一赌注超过了市场和该银行经济学家的观点。【原文：Citigroup Inc.’s traders are betting on three half-point interest-rate cuts from the Federal Reserve this year, a wager that outpaces both the market and the view of the bank’s economists.】

item.title: 高盛和美国银行正在为厄瓜多尔制定新的债务交换方案
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and Bank of America Corp. are laying the groundwork for a swap that will help Ecuador manage its debt financing costs in exchange for a pledge to protect part of the Amazon rainforest, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德国商业银行首席执行官曼弗雷德-克诺夫（Manfred Knof）角逐下一任期，德国退缩了
item.description: 曼弗雷德-克诺夫（Manfred Knof）执掌德国商业银行股份公司近四年后，不仅提高了盈利能力，还说服政府该银行已准备好完全私有化。【原文：After almost four years at the helm of Commerzbank AG, Manfred Knof has boosted profitability and persuaded the government the lender is ready for full private ownership.】

item.title: 俄罗斯缩小预算缺口，经济为普京的战争财库注入活力
item.description: 俄罗斯的预算赤字缩小了，因为强劲的经济增长增加了收入，有助于弥补克里姆林宫因乌克兰战争而增加的开支。【原文：Russia’s budget deficit shrank as strong economic growth boosted revenue to help cover increased Kremlin spending driven by the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 穆巴达拉将全面控制土耳其外卖应用 Getir
item.description: 阿布扎比穆巴达拉投资公司（Abu Dhabi's Mubadala Investment Co.【原文：Abu Dhabi’s Mubadala Investment Co. is poised to take sole control of Turkish grocery delivery startup Getir after a power struggle that followed the startup’s decline following Covid-19-era lockdowns.】

item.title: 欧洲央行衡量工资增长的关键指标在可能降息前放缓
item.description: 衡量欧元区工资增长的一项关键指标有所放缓；这为欧洲中央银行官员下周寻求降低利率提供了进一步保证。【原文：A key measure of euro-zone wage growth eased — providing further assurance to European Central Bank officials seeking to lower interest rates next week.】

item.title: 韩国大型项目开发商面临失去场地的风险
item.description: 韩国最雄心勃勃的房地产项目之一的开发商在拖欠利息超过六个月后，面临失去土地的风险。【原文：The developer of one of South Korea’s most ambitious real estate projects is at risk of losing the land after missing interest payments for more than six months.】
